articles.author: Ivan Kassal, Tingrei Tan
articles.title: Australian researchers use a quantum computer to simulate how real molecules behave - The Conversation
articles.description: Quantum computers are getting closer and closer to being useful in the real world.
articles.content: When a molecule absorbs light, it undergoes a whirlwind of quantum-mechanical transformations. Electrons jump between energy levels, atoms vibrate, and chemical bonds shift all within millionths of a… [+3857 chars]
